name: Nissa, Worldsoul Speaker
oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
You may pay eight {E} rather than pay the mana cost for permanent spells you cast.
flavor_text: "Zendikar still seems so far off, but Chandra is my home."

name: Static Orb
oracle_text: As long as this artifact is untapped, players can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps.
flavor_text: The warriors fought against the paralyzing waves until even their thoughts froze in place.

name: Sensory Deprivation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
flavor_text: They call it "stitcher's anesthesia," a spell to deaden the senses while the mad doctors begin their grisly work.

name: Road of Return
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Put your commander into your hand from the command zone.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Snarlfang Vermin
oracle_text:
Whenever Snarlfang Vermin deals combat damage to a creature, if that creature is still on the battlefield, suspect that creature. It perpetually gains this ability.
Whenever a suspected creature an opponent controls dies while Snarlfang Vermin is in your graveyard, that opponent loses 1 life.

name: Walking Sponge
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature loses your choice of flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Not only does it catch fish, it cleans them too.

name: Ravnica at War
oracle_text: Exile all multicolored permanents.
flavor_text: The heart of Ravnica disappeared before anyone could strike a blow in its defense.

name: Greta, Sweettooth Scourge
oracle_text:
When Greta enters, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")
{G}, Sacrifice a Food: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a Food: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Torrent of Fire
oracle_text: Torrent of Fire deals damage to any target equal to the greatest mana value among permanents you control.
flavor_text: Dragon fire melts any instrument designed to measure it.

name: Wyluli Wolf
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"When one wolf calls, others follow. Who wants to fight creatures that eat scorpions?"
—Maimun al-Wyluli, diary

name: Pteramander
oracle_text:
Flying
{7}{U}: Adapt 4. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

name: Nantuko Elder
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{G}.
flavor_text:
Plant a field with wishes, and you will grow more wishes.
—Nantuko teaching

name: Vedalken Heretic
oracle_text: Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "Etherium clouded my eyes, clogged my ears, desensitized my skin. Now that I can feel, I can begin to learn."

name: Waterknot
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When this Aura enters, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Ruthless Knave
oracle_text:
{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
Sacrifice three Treasures: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "This scum is barely worth the trouble."

name: Palinchron
oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, untap up to seven lands.
{2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand.

name: Phyrexian Broodstar
oracle_text:
Affinity for Phyrexians (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Phyrexian you control.)
Flying
Phyrexian Broodstar's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Phyrexians you control.

name: Hua Tuo, Honored Physician
oracle_text: {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Veil of Summer
oracle_text: Draw a card if an opponent has cast a blue or black spell this turn. Spells you control can't be countered this turn. You and permanents you control gain hexproof from blue and from black until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of blue or black spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Disposal Mummy
oracle_text: When this creature enters, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
flavor_text: Without the viziers to oversee their actions, some anointed went to extreme lengths to fulfill their directives.

name: Wei Strike Force
oracle_text: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
flavor_text: At the battle of Chang'an, Ma Chao defeated the two generals Cao Cao sent to guard the pass but was forced to flee when Cao Cao's trickery turned his own ally against him.

name: Marang River Prowler
oracle_text:
This creature can't block and can't be blocked.
You may cast this card from your graveyard as long as you control a black or green permanent.
flavor_text: The currents of the Marang wash away both tracks and blood.

name: Aura Graft
oracle_text: Gain control of target Aura that's attached to a permanent. Attach it to another permanent it can enchant.
flavor_text: "It's not really stealing. It's more like extended borrowing."

name: Murk Dwellers
oracle_text: Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.
flavor_text: When Raganorn unsealed the catacombs, he found more than the dead and their treasures.

name: Whispering Shade
oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It glides through the shadows until it reaches yours.

name: Wall of Fortune
oracle_text:
Defender
You may tap an untapped Wall you control to have any player reroll a die that player rolled.
flavor_text: "You need a six? All right everyone, she needs a six!"

name: Saheeli's Artistry
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Create a token that's a copy of target artifact.
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.
flavor_text: "From the first touch, I know exactly what the metal wants to be."

name: Kalitas, Bloodchief of Ghet
oracle_text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, create a black Vampire creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness.

name: Safewright Quest
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Elves search for sources of beauty in a nighted world. Meanwhile, the nighted world searches for the blood of elves.

name: Instill Infection
oracle_text:
Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread."
—Vedalken research notes

name: Gleeful Demolition // Gleeful Demolition
set_name: Phyrexia: All Will Be One Art Series

name: Weakstone
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get -1/-0.
flavor_text: During the brothers' childhood, Tocasia took them to explore the sacred cave of Koilos. There, in the Hall of Tagsin, Mishra discovered the mysterious weakstone.

name: Demon
oracle_text: Flying

all_parts.name: Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath

name: Strength of Night
oracle_text:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, Zombie creatures you control get an additional +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: High-Rise Sawjack
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever this creature blocks a creature with flying, this creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Slicing girders, rescuing trapped workers, killing gigantic rust flies—one tool does it all!

name: Spike, Tournament Grinder
oracle_text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
{B/P}{B/P}{B/P}{B/P}: Reveal a card you own from outside the game that has been banned or restricted in a Constructed format and put it into your hand.
flavor_text: "Just wait—I have a response."

name: Keldon Raider
oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: Keldon raiders' spoils are limited to what their colos can carry. No matter the value, the rest goes up in smoke.

name: Leopard-Spotted Jiao
set_name: Global Series Jiang Yanggu & Mu Yanling
flavor_text: This strange beast has the hide of a leopard, the howl of a dog, and the horns of an ox.

name: Escape Tunnel
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: No self-respecting criminal has a basement with only one exit.

name: Food Fight
oracle_text: Artifacts you control have "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals damage to any target equal to 1 plus the number of permanents named Food Fight you control."
flavor_text: With no time to gather weapons, the dwarves fought the redcaps with anything within reach.

name: Behemoth Sledge
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.
Equip {3}
flavor_text: Those who worship the great gargantuans could hardly be expected to fight with a subtle weapon.

name: Tatsunari, Toad Rider // Tatsunari, Toad Rider
Toluz, Clever Conductor
oracle_text:
When Toluz enters, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Whenever you discard one or more cards, exile them from your graveyard.
When Toluz dies, put the cards exiled with it into their owner's hand.

name: Kindred Discovery
oracle_text:
As this enchantment enters, choose a creature type.
Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters or attacks, draw a card.
set_name: The Lost Caverns of Ixalan Commander
flavor_text: Few things are truly "lost" at sea.

name: Stern Marshal
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Trapjaw Tyrant

—Huatli

oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Domain — Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor_text: All Dominarians agreed on one thing: they would not go down without a fight.

oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.)
This land enters tapped.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Broad prairies feed the human sanctuary of Drannith and conceal a network of caverns where giant cats make their dens.

name: Pirate
oracle_text: This creature can't block.

name: Warden of the First Tree

{1}{W/B}: This creature becomes a Human Warrior with base power and toughness 3/3.
{2}{W/B}{W/B}: If this creature is a Warrior, it becomes a Human Spirit Warrior with trample and lifelink.
{3}{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: If this creature is a Spirit, put five +1/+1 counters on it.

Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

oracle_text:
Flash

Whenever enchanted creature or another modified creature you control dies, create X 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens, where X is that creature's power. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

Kicker—Sacrifice an artifact or Goblin. (You may sacrifice an artifact or Goblin in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Goblin Barrage deals 4 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it also deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.

name: Dungeon Delver
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "Room abilities of dungeons you own trigger an additional time."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: You're driven not by a lust for gold or baubles, but by the thrill of danger and the excitement of the unknown.

name: Errand-Rider of Gondor
oracle_text: When this creature enters, draw a card. Then if you don't control a legendary creature, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
set_name: The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth
flavor_text: "Gondor is in great need. Lord Denethor asks for all your strength and all your speed, lest Gondor fall at last."

name: Pharika's Mender
oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may return target creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "The direst venom becomes a panacea under Pharika's guidance. I bring it to the worthy, clinging at the edge of the abyss."

name: Mind Extraction
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors.

name: Thopter Assembly
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Thopters other than this creature, return this creature to its owner's hand and create five 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

name: Professor of Zoomancy // Professor of Zoomancy
Vivisection Evangelist
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Corrupted — When this creature enters, if an opponent has three or more poison counters, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "May you rejoice in the magnificence of Norn. May your flesh serve perfection."

name: Theft of Dreams
oracle_text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
flavor_text: Energy is never lost, only transformed.

name: Witch's Mark
oracle_text:
You may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.
Create a Wicked Role token attached to up to one target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this token is put into a graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life.)

name: Dakmor Scorpion
flavor_text: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe *around* your boot, but not *in* it.

Brawn
oracle_text:
Trample
As long as this card is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.
flavor_text:
"'I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered."
—*Scroll of Beginnings*

name: Steadfast Cathar
oracle_text: Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The most resolute soldiers will press forward in the face of overwhelming odds."
—Gideon Jura

name: Harald, King of Skemfar
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Harald enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an Elf, Warrior, or Tyvar card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Magma Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{T}: Target Sliver creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers on the battlefield."
flavor_text: As malleable as molten steel, but as dangerous as the finished blade.

oracle_text:
Deem Worthy deals 7 damage to target creature.
Cycling {3}{R} ({3}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle this card, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature.

name: Coalition Relic
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact.
At the beginning of your first main phase, remove all charge counters from this artifact. Add one mana of any color for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Vizier of Deferment

Flash
When this creature enters, you may exile target creature if it attacked or blocked this turn. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Tinybones, Trinket Thief
oracle_text:
At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent discarded a card this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
{4}{B}{B}: Each opponent with no cards in hand loses 10 life.
flavor_text: Big distractions mean tiny nuisances can slip by unnoticed.

name: Shizo, Death's Storehouse
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {B}.
{B}, {T}: Target legendary creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: Centuries ago, Shizo was a verdant field of wildflowers. After 891 samurai died in a single battle on its grasses, it became a haunted moor.

oracle_text:
Create two 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature tokens.

flavor_text:
"When merrows talk, listeners grow fins."
—Kithkin saying

name: Courageous Outrider
oracle_text: When this creature enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a Human card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: One silvery blast signaled that she wouldn't be arriving at Thraben alone.

name: Soul-Scar Mage
oracle_text:
Prowess
If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to a creature an opponent controls, put that many -1/-1 counters on that creature instead.

oracle_text:
Flying
Revolt — When this creature enters, if a permanent left the battlefield under your control this turn, you gain 5 life.

oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever this Vehicle becomes crewed for the first time each turn, until end of turn, this Vehicle becomes a copy of target nonlegendary creature that crewed it this turn, except it's 4/3, it's a Vehicle artifact in addition to its other types, and it has flying.

name: Scaled Wurm
flavor_text: The wurms become so big, a single scale can be used as a roof for a human dwelling.

Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Flying
When this creature enters, each opponent discards a card. For each opponent who can't, you draw a card.

Yorvo enters with four +1/+1 counters on it.

Flying
